data.title: In 2040 fully-automated robotic hotels will be common
Genetic modifications will be regulated for use on human beings in 2030
Full-sensory VR will be indistinguishable from real-life in 2070
Millions of people will live at sea in floating cities in 2070
In 2035 most people will video record every moment of daily life, replayable on demand
In 2040 most cases of deafness is curable with sensory implants
Brain-computer interfaces will be in mainstream use in 2040
In 2030 hospitals will have limitless supply of artificial blood
China will become the largest economy in 2028
The PS5 will be released in November 2020
In 2035 most vehicles on the road will be autonomous
Tesla will become the biggest public transportation company in the world
Polar bears will go extinct
The Boring Company will cooperate with SpaceX to mine asteroids before 2040
Avatar 2 will earn over 3 billion USD
Avatar 2 will set a new record for box office sales
In 20 years, most elderly people will wear an exoskeleton to aid mobility
Pervasive surveilance in combination with preemptive intervention will end most violent crime around the world
In the future, we will need to rely on technology companies to verify the truthfulness of everything we witness in the media
In 2040 most consumer products will be 3D printed
In a few decades, mind-controlled prosthetics will achieve mainstream adoption by people without disabilities as a means of enhancing dexterity and sensory capabilities
In 2040 your nutrition will be managed by companies using data analytics to ensure you get the optimal level of vitamins and minerals
In 2050 most people will react with disgust at the thought of eating animals
Over the coming decades, entertainment will become overwhelmingly personalised, to the point where any given experience is designed with you and only you in mind
Hyperloop travel will become the dominant mode of long-distance transportation
Augmented/Mixed reality will be ubiquitous in 15 years time
Within a few years, technology companies will predict acts of extremism and facilitate early intervention
An Artificial General Intelligence will be developed within the next 50 years
Job automation and the resulting improvement of work/life balance will trigger an increase in birth rates
Most people will work remotely by 2035
Nuclear weapons will never again be used in warfare
A colony will be established on Mars by 2035
In the future, people will wear technologically enhanced clothing capable of changing shape, texture and color
In a few decades most urban traffic will move underground utilising a complex system of tunnels
Turkey will join the EU
The UK will leave the EU with "No Deal" in October 2019
By 2050 most babies will be conceived in a laboratory environment
Humans will be responsible for the largest mass extinction event in history
There will be a female US president by 2030
The acting profession will go into rapid decline within the next decade
A Universal Basic Income will be established in the western world within 20 years
Tesla will achieve level 5 autonomy by 2022
50% of all vehicles on the road will be electric in 2030
Average commute times will increase when autonomous transportation networks become established
Artificial organ transplants will become a commodity by 2040
The tourism industry will double within the next 2 decades
Most public transportation will be free in 2040
